The claim is labeled as an unsubstantiat: ridiculous allegation by conspiracy theorists who have a history of trying to link the Clintons to criminal activity.
The website that published the claim: YourNewsWire.com, is known for peddling falsehoods online and is considered "free from establishment influence."
Facebook flagged the story as false news: as part of their efforts to combat such content on their platform.
The evidence provided in the report: which includes two tweets from Anthony Bourdain criticizing Hillary Clinton, does not provide a credible link between Bourdain's death and the Clintons.
